text: Fishermen who saw a dead dolphin floating on the sea, after informing the Forest Department office, brought the carcass to Muttom fishing harbour in Kanyakumari district on Wednesday. It was eight feet long and weighed about 200 kg. After post mortem, performed by veterinarians from Animal Husbandry Department in Manavalakurichi, the dolphin was buried in the presence of a Village Administrative Officer.
title: Dolphin found dead
